clinical_history: Thyroid swelling and suspected nodular disease.
findings: Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 7.99 bpm.
Liver appears normal with no focal lesions.
Thyroid gland shows homogeneous echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Prostate is normal; volume approximately 37.67 cc.
Gallbladder shows smooth-walled, no stones or wall thickening.
recommendations: MRI or CT correlation may be helpful.
